issue.title: [Packaging][wheel] Boost download is failed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9058](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9058). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=12893&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=d9b15392-e4ce-5e4c-0c8c-b69645229181

```

+ curl -sL https://dl.bintray.com/boostorg/release/1.68.0/source/boost_1_68_0.tar.gz -o /boost_1_68_0.tar.gz
+ tar xf boost_1_68_0.tar.gz
tar: This does not look like a tar archive
tar: Error exit delayed from previous errors
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9058?focusedCommentId=17128115) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7368
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7368>
